Portfolio.title: My Portfolio
Portfolio.desc: A collection of my projects and experiments.
Portfolio.project1Desc: Bluetooth adapter using ESP32 for wireless connectivity of USB keyboards and mice.
Portfolio.project2Desc: Bioreactor CSV server and monitoring app with Redis, Firebase, and Flutter integration.
Portfolio.project3Desc: Arduino-based RGB LED lighting controller and control system.
Portfolio.project4Desc: Python-based serial communication GUI program for embedded debugging.
Portfolio.project5Desc: Automated public data collection and processing system using Python.
Portfolio.project6Desc: Excel workflow automation macros developed with VBA.
Portfolio.project7Desc: Mobile application for biometric data testing built with Dart/Flutter.
Portfolio.project8Desc: Next.js 16-based multilingual portfolio and news platform.
Portfolio.project9Desc: String calculator project for Woowacourse precourse assignment.

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Embedded & Full-Stack Developer
About.intro: With experience in embedded development using Arduino and ESP32, I work across various domains including IoT systems, 3D modeling/printing, and full-stack web development. I'm passionate about bridging the physical hardware world with the digital realm.
About.job1Desc: Various embedded projects including ESP32 BLE adapter, bioreactor IoT system, and Arduino RGB controller
About.job2Desc: Next.js portfolio site, real-time news platform, and Flutter app development
